channel.title: [DENIED]LoL Board
channel.description: Well i think a board dedicated to the popular game known as League of Legends is required primarily because many members play it and would love to discuss it or just find a group players to play with.

item.title: [DENIED]LoL Board
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I don’t see a problem with having different boards as long as they actually have some activity. It’s not like adding other boards will take away from visitors to current boards

Read full topic

item.title: [DENIED]LoL Board
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:22, topic:530731”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=649213.msg4363773#msg4363773 date=1379254680]
How much do you guys wish to derive this forums from its true purpose?
[/quote][/quote]

Well, to be honest if we added a LoL board you could argue we are moving in a positive direction.

Read full topic

item.title: [DENIED]LoL Board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:18, topic:530731”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=649492.msg4364752#msg4364752 date=1379437334]

don’t think it would get enough posts to be worth a board

Isn’t it one of the most popular games in the world at the moment, if not the most popular?
[/quote]it has been the most popular game in the world for quite a while, but as you can see from the LoL topic it just doesn’t get a lot of posts

For a single thread it gets a lot of posts but that definitely doesn’t justify an entire board.[/quote]yea when minecraft got a board it was getting like a topic with many posts on it per day is I guess the point. speaking of which those boards are not dead and need to be consolidated and/or made a subboard of other games. A sub board for league might not be horrible I guess, I just dont see more than around 10 that play it here

Read full topic

item.title: [DENIED]LoL Board
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:7, topic:530731”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=649492.msg4364310#msg4364310 date=1379358672]

don’t think it would get enough posts to be worth a board

Edit: and the way I understand it at least is the only way a game/server gets it own board is if they

are supported by MITB and have been around for a very long time

So…in theory…

April 13, 2012

wouldn’t meet their qualifications.
[/quote]
League of Legends has been around since 2009. My account was created October 2009.

TBh; the thread we have is just fine at the moment - in future probably not, the game’s popularity among the forum users is rapidly growing it appears.[/quote]what are you talking about? I was referring to the date the LOL topic on mopar was made.

Read full topic
